CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 26, 1946, pg. 20, reads: "Gay Celebration - Mr. and Mrs. J. Pugh of Swissvale recently entertained at a luncheon in Crawford Grill dining room in honor of their granddaughter, Darlene Casey. Guests included Mable Casie, the honoree's mother; Celonia Turner, the guest of honor, Katherine Nelson, Caroline Freeman and Juanita Baskin. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mable or Mabel Casie or Casey wearing dark snood, Celonia Turner, honoree Darlene Casey or Casie, Katherine Nelson, Caroline Freeman, and Juanita Baskin, with plates of food for celebration of Darlene, in dining room of Crawford Grill No. 1, another version
